org.apache.flink.api.java.record.io

Class CollectionInputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.GenericInputFormat<org.apache.flink.types.Record>
      • org.apache.flink.api.java.record.io.CollectionInputFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.apache.flink.api.common.io.InputFormat<org.apache.flink.types.Record,org.apache.flink.core.io.GenericInputSplit>, org.apache.flink.api.common.io.NonParallelInput

    public class CollectionInputFormat
extends org.apache.flink.api.common.io.GenericInputFormat<org.apache.flink.types.Record>
implements org.apache.flink.api.common.io.NonParallelInput
    input format for java collection input. It can accept collection data or serializable iterator
